short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install Zenwall - a custom New Tab with beautiful wallpapers and backgrounds to make your day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install ZenWall - a custom New Tab with beautiful wallpapers and backgrounds to make your day!

Replace your basic new tab with ZenWall's AI-generated wallpapers. Designed especially for AI generated art fans.

Enhance your browsing experience with New Tab extension for Chrome™. Customize your new tab page, enjoy easy search experience, and power your searches with Microsoft Bing. ZenWall also offers AI-generated wallpapers to beautify your new tab experience.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing 'ZenWall', change New Tab to that provided by the service, New Tab searches to be provided by Microsoft Bing, the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

ZenWall also offers time, date and weather based on your geo location, that can easily be turned off using the ‘Settings’ menu on the New Tab page.

Terms of Use: https://zenwall.co/terms-and-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://zenwall.co/privacy-policy/
About Us: https://zenwall.co/about/
Contact: https://zenwall.co/contact/

Free stock media content is distributed by Wallpaperflare - https://www.wallpaperflare.com/

Install now and enjoy beautiful browsing experience from the future with ZenWall each time you open a new tab.
